paper_abstract: A simplex algorithm used to solve molecular structure from asymptotic momentum values is reported. The geometry of CO(2)(3+) molecular ions in linear and bent configurations is reconstructed. A polyatomic molecular ion with trigonal planar symmetry is used to demonstrate the scalability of the algorithm. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Ultrafast imaging of polyatomic molecules with simplex algorithm
